title: Bug 109455After deleting an embeded image, "Insert in layout" is not grayed out in context menu of outline view.
OB: Bug 109455After deleting an embeded image, "Insert in layout" is not grayed out in context menu of outline view. Description: After deleting an embeded image, "Insert in layout" is not grayedout in context menu of outline view.Steps to reproduce:1. Delete this image and right click mouse.Actual result: in context menu, "insert in layout" is not grayed out but ifyou select it, it doesn't take effect.
SR: Description: After deleting an embeded image, "Insert in layout" is not grayedout in context menu of outline view.Steps to reproduce:1. Add an embeded image in outline view.2. Delete this image and right click mouse.Actual result: in context menu, "insert in layout" is not grayed out but ifyou select it, it doesn't take effect.
